alert.note: Alert for Clark; Grant; Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 18 at 10:10AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Clark, west central Grant and Hot Spring Counties through 1045 AM CST... At 1009 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Caddo Valley, or near Arkadelphia, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Arkadelphia... Malvern... Rockport... Caddo Valley... Prattsville... Poyen... Perla... DeGray Lake State Park... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Donaldson... Friendship... Magnet Cove... Lower Lake Recreation Area... Social Hill... Gifford... De Roche... Lake Catherine State Park... Midway in Hot Spring County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CST for central and southwestern Arkansas.
